wikipedia_page.main: Peter Hayes (born 1946) is a contemporary sculptor now based in Bath, England, whose work is displayed in public locations including the UK, US, Canada and Belgium.

response: The distinctive lodges of Cleveland Bridge are now restored to their former glory and are back in use as homes. One, however, remains a working premises. Sculptures by ceramic artist Peter Hayes are on display around the world but he still works from a studio below his gallery at lodge number 2. His techniques for creating a patina include immersing half-completed pieces for a period of months in the river, where they absorb minerals from the water.
* Peter Hayes (actor) (born 1957), Australian actor and director
* Peter Hayes (died 2001), Australian horse trainer, son of Colin Hayes
* Peter Hayes (footballer) (born 1938), Australian footballer for Collingwood
* Peter Hayes (musician) (born 1976), American indie rock guitarist and singer
